DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate relation previous presence endothelial dysfunction development radial artery vasospasm trans-radial coronary evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Endothelial Function Trans Radial-procedural Events
DOC.detailed_description: All patient undergo pre procedural endoPAT assessment endothelial dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Patients without angiographic proof coronary disease , schedule elective coronary angiographic evaluation radial approach . Impossibility perform radial approach ; abnormal Barbeau test result ( type C D ) ; previous important trauma upper limb ; presence fistule renal dialysis ; lymphedema ; acute myocardial infarction , severe valvular heart disease ; patient NYHA class III IV heart failure ; malignancy ; active myocarditis ; HIV infection immunodeficiency state ; chronic viral infection ; acute systemic infection require antibiotic ; systemic inflammatory disease ; Raynaud 's syndrome ; refusal sign informed consent form . All participant must give write informed consent
